trans-unit.source: Exception occurs if Azure storage account name or container name specified incorrectly.
trans-unit.target: Exception occurs if Azure storage account name or container name specified incorrectly.

trans-unit.source: You will receive this error if you enter an incorrect account name or password for the storage account, if the container name within Azure storage is incorrect, if the container does not exist, or if the path to the blob is incorrectly specified.
trans-unit.target: You will receive this error if you enter an incorrect account name or password for the storage account, if the container name within Azure storage is incorrect, if the container does not exist, or if the path to the blob is incorrectly specified.

trans-unit.source: Such problems can occur if you manually enter the account name, password, or container path.
trans-unit.target: Such problems can occur if you manually enter the account name, password, or container path.

trans-unit.source: It may also occur if the account, container, or blob has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: It may also occur if the account, container, or blob has been deleted.

trans-unit.source: Verify that the account name and password have been entered correctly, and that the container exists.
trans-unit.target: Verify that the account name and password have been entered correctly, and that the container exists.

trans-unit.source: If the complete path to a blob was specified, verify that the path is specified as <userInputLocalizable>container/blobname</userInputLocalizable>, and that both the container and the blob exist in the account.
trans-unit.target: If the complete path to a blob was specified, verify that the path is specified as <userInputLocalizable>container/blobname</userInputLocalizable>, and that both the container and the blob exist in the account.

trans-unit.source: The path should not contain a leading slash.
trans-unit.target: The path should not contain a leading slash.

trans-unit.source: For example <userInputLocalizable>/container/blob</userInputLocalizable> is incorrect and should be entered as <userInputLocalizable>container/blob</userInputLocalizable>.
trans-unit.target: For example <userInputLocalizable>/container/blob</userInputLocalizable> is incorrect and should be entered as <userInputLocalizable>container/blob</userInputLocalizable>.

trans-unit.source: The Azure storage account name or container name is incorrect.
trans-unit.target: The Azure storage account name or container name is incorrect.

trans-unit.source: The Azure storage account name "{0}" or container name "{1}" is incorrect; a container name of the format container/blob was expected.
trans-unit.target: The Azure storage account name "{0}" or container name "{1}" is incorrect; a container name of the format container/blob was expected.
